p.s: If you are like many people , you are a person that has many different identities , good and bad .
Many people do not fulfill their several identities but instead settle for only living out one identity .
Others , because they are braver , or simply more adventurous , embrace their several identities and live them out to their fullest .
However , usually , out of necessity , you must separate your chosen identities and thus live multiple lives .
This article should help guide you along the way to living two ( or more ! ) different lives in a legal manner .

item.s: Realize and accept you are a multifaceted and complex person .
For some , this can be hard to realize because they have , for their entire life , felt constricted and trapped by the roles they have been forced to play in their life .
The concept that you are a different person than those around you realize can be quite a liberating experience .

figure.rend: Live Two Different Lives (Non Illegal Purposes) Step 1.jpg

item.s: Discover who you really are .
You are allowed to be whoever you truly are .
( Within reason of course !
If you are not a brain surgeon than please do n't scrub in for surgery and start operating !
Please do n't hurt others . )

figure.rend: Live Two Different Lives (Non Illegal Purposes) Step 2.jpg

item.s: Figure out ways to live and be yourself .
Take classes , read books , and research the identity you believe you are .
Simply just be yourself .
If you secretly really want to be a drag queen , then rent a hotel room , dress up , find a friendly club and go crazy out there !
If you are younger ( under 18 ) than this is obviously where you will have the most trouble .
Your parents and family may have issues with you just being yourself especially if they are strict .
This is where it really helps to have at least one person who knows who your other identity is , and who you can be your true self around even just to vent .

figure.rend: Live Two Different Lives (Non Illegal Purposes) Step 3.jpg

item.s: Figure out if you need money .
Some double lives require a lot of cash on hand .
Such is the case if you have to travel frequently to fulfill your life .
Think through this and make sure you are set financially .
Get another job if you have to ( this in itself can be a secret life depending on the work you do ) .

figure.rend: Live Two Different Lives (Non Illegal Purposes) Step 4.jpg

item.s: Find ways to be yourself and have fun !

figure.rend: Live Two Different Lives (Non Illegal Purposes) Step 5.jpg

item.s: If you know your job will have a problem with who you are , then you are basically in the same situation as when your parents did not approve .
Thankfully , however , it is easier to hide what you are doing from your employer then it is to hide it from your parents .
If you believe you may lose your employment if your boss finds out what you are doing then be very careful !
